message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to make a deal, but I'd like to save a bit more money.
I understand your desire to save a bit more money, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $107.50. It's a fair compromise, if you ask me!

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than $107.50. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I'd like to get it for $106. It's a fair price, and I'm willing to walk away if it doesn't work out.

I understand you're close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $106.25. It's still a great deal for both of us, and I think you'll be happy with the price.

I'm really close to my target price, but I'd like to get it a bit lower. I'm willing to meet you at $106, but I'd prefer to get it for $105.50. It's a small difference, but it would make a big difference to me.

I understand you're really close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $105.75. It's still a great deal for both of us, and I think you'll be happy with the price.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short of my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $105.50 and $105.75, which is $105.625. I'd be happy to buy the product at this price.
